name: Don't Wake Up Yet
description:
You sleep...

You are in your dream...

Your subconscious is trying to find the answer to your sadness.

Explore all the endings to get a different and deeper answer.

The deeper your transcend the more complicated the answer will be.

Assets used:

Main Menu song: https://pixabay.com/music/solo-piano-waves-and-tears-sad-piano-music-with-calm-o...

Endings 3 & 4 are going to be added soon!! Like.. 

really soon!

Made for Mini Jam 105: Dreamy!
